      • tagToPOS

        public Optional<edu.mit.jwi.item.POS> tagToPOS(String tag)
        Converts supported tags to MIT part-of-speech tags
        Parameters:
        tag - the Stanford NLP tag
        Returns:
        an Optional containing the MIT part-of-speech tag associated with the given Stanford NLP tag, if the given tag is supported; an empty Optional otherwise.

        Description copied from interface: WordProcessor
        Returns true if the input String is a recognized word.
        Specified by:
        isWord in interface WordProcessor
        Parameters:
        maybeWord - a String that may or may not be a word.
        Returns:

      • getLemma

        public Optional<String> getLemma(String word,
                                 edu.mit.jwi.item.POS partOfSpeech)
        Description copied from interface: WordProcessor
        Returns a lemma for the given word, with the supplied part of speech. Generally, this word will be a more general word for the input, but this will not necessarily always be the case.
        Specified by:
        getLemma in interface WordProcessor
        Parameters:
        word - the word for which a lemma will be returned
        partOfSpeech - the part of speech of the given word
        Returns:
        the first word in the first synset containing the given word in the given part of speech.
